verses.verse: וַיּוֹלִכֵ֖נִי <S%H1980><s%> vai-yo-li-Che-ni led אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַשָּׁ֑עַר <S%H8179><s%> hash-Sha-'ar; me to the gate שַׁ֕עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar [even] the gate אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after פֹּנֶ֖ה <S%H6437><s%> po-Neh that looketh דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech toward הַקָּדִֽים׃ <S%H6921><s%> hak-ka-Dim. the east

וְהִנֵּ֗ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh, and behold כְּבוֹד֙ <S%H3519><s%> ke-Vod And behold the glory אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei of the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> ba came מִדֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> mid-De-rech from the way הַקָּדִ֑ים <S%H6921><s%> hak-ka-Dim; of the east וְקוֹל֗וֹ <S%H6963><s%> ve-ko-Lo, and his voice כְּקוֹל֙ <S%H6963><s%> ke-kOl [was] like a noise מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim waters רַבִּ֔ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim, of many וְהָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ve-ha-'A-retz and the earth הֵאִ֥ירָה <S%H215><s%> he-'I-rah shined מִכְּבֹדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3519><s%> mik-ke-vo-Do. with his glory

וּכְמַרְאֵ֨ה <S%H4758><s%> u-che-mar-'Eh And [it was] according to the appearance הַמַּרְאֶ֜ה <S%H4758><s%> ham-mar-'Eh of the vision אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which רָאִ֗יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti, which I saw כַּמַּרְאֶ֤ה <S%H4758><s%> kam-mar-'Eh [even] according to the vision אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which רָאִ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti that I saw בְּבֹאִי֙ <S%H935><s%> be-vo-'I when I came לְשַׁחֵ֣ת <S%H7843><s%> le-sha-Chet to destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעִ֔יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir, the city וּמַרְא֕וֹת <S%H4758><s%> u-mar-'ot [were] like the vision כַּמַּרְאֶ֕ה <S%H4758><s%> kam-mar-'Eh of the vision אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which רָאִ֖יתִי <S%H7200><s%> ra-'I-ti that I saw אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- by נְהַר־ <S%H5104><s%> ne-har- by the river כְּבָ֑ר <S%H3529><s%> ke-Var; Chebar וָאֶפֹּ֖ל <S%H5307><s%> va-'ep-Pol and I fell אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- on פָּנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nai. upon my face

וּכְב֥וֹד <S%H3519><s%> u-che-Vod And the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> ba came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit; into the house דֶּ֣רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech by the way שַׁ֔עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar, of the gate אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav whose prospect דֶּ֥רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> De-rech [is] toward הַקָּדִֽים׃ <S%H6921><s%> hak-ka-Dim. the east

וַתִּשָּׂאֵ֣נִי <S%H5375><s%> vat-tis-sa-'E-ni took me up ר֔וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> Ru-ach, So the spirit וַתְּבִיאֵ֕נִי <S%H935><s%> vat-te-vi-'E-ni and brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הֶֽחָצֵ֖ר <S%H2691><s%> he-cha-Tzer court הַפְּנִימִ֑י <S%H6442><s%> hap-pe-ni-Mi; me into the inner וְהִנֵּ֛ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold מָלֵ֥א <S%H4390><s%> ma-Le filled כְבוֹד־ <S%H3519><s%> che-Vod- and behold the glory יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit. the house

וָאֶשְׁמַ֛ע <S%H8085><s%> va-'esh-Ma' And I heard מִדַּבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> mid-dab-Ber [him] speaking אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai to me מֵהַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> me-hab-Ba-yit; unto me out of the house וְאִ֕ישׁ <S%H376><s%> ve-'Ish and the man הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become עֹמֵ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> 'o-Med stood אֶצְלִֽי׃ <S%H681><s%> 'etz-Li. by me

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- unto me Son אָדָם֙ <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam of man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> me-Kom the place כִּסְאִ֗י <S%H3678><s%> kis-'I, of my throne וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מְקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> me-kOm and the place כַּפּ֣וֹת <S%H3709><s%> kap-Pot of the soles רַגְלַ֔י <S%H7272><s%> rag-Lai, of my feet אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher I אֶשְׁכָּן־ <S%H7931><s%> 'esh-kon- where I will dwell שָׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> sham in it בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> be-Toch in the midst בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְעוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam; for ever וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor יְטַמְּא֣וּ <S%H2930><s%> ye-tam-me-'U no more defile ע֣וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od again בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- shall the house יִ֠שְׂרָאֵל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'el of Israel שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> shem name קָדְשִׁ֞י <S%H6944><s%> kod-shi and my holy הֵ֤מָּה <S%H1992><s%> Hem-mah like וּמַלְכֵיהֶם֙ <S%H4428><s%> u-mal-chei-Hem [neither] they nor their kings בִּזְנוּתָ֔ם <S%H2184><s%> biz-nu-Tam, by their whoredom וּבְפִגְרֵ֥י <S%H6297><s%> u-ve-fig-Rei nor by the carcases מַלְכֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4428><s%> mal-chei-Hem of their kings בָּמוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1116><s%> ba-mo-Tam. in their high places

בְּתִתָּ֨ם <S%H5414><s%> be-tit-Tam In their setting סִפָּ֜ם <S%H5592><s%> sip-Pam of their threshold אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- סִפִּ֗י <S%H5592><s%> sip-Pi, by my thresholds וּמְזֽוּזָתָם֙ <S%H4201><s%> u-me-zu-za-Tam and their post אֵ֣צֶל <S%H681><s%> 'E-tzel by מְזוּזָתִ֔י <S%H4201><s%> me-zu-za-Ti, my posts וְהַקִּ֖יר <S%H7023><s%> ve-hak-Kir and the wall בֵּינִ֣י <S%H996><s%> bei-Ni between וּבֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H996><s%> u-vei-nei-Hem; between וְטִמְּא֣וּ׀ <S%H2930><s%> ve-tim-me-'U between me and them they have even defiled אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> shem name קָדְשִׁ֗י <S%H6944><s%> kod-shi my holy בְּתֽוֹעֲבוֹתָם֙ <S%H8441><s%> be-to-'a-vo-Tam by their abominations אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשׂ֔וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su, that they have committed וָאֲכַ֥ל <S%H398><s%> va-'a-Chal burn up אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam בְּאַפִּֽי׃ <S%H639><s%> be-'ap-Pi. them in mine anger

עַתָּ֞ה <S%H6258><s%> 'at-Tah Now יְרַחֲק֧וּ <S%H7368><s%> ye-ra-cha-Ku far אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- זְנוּתָ֛ם <S%H2184><s%> ze-nu-Tam their whoredom וּפִגְרֵ֥י <S%H6297><s%> u-fig-Rei and the carcases מַלְכֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4428><s%> mal-chei-Hem of their kings מִמֶּ֑נִּי <S%H4480><s%> mi-Men-ni; and I וְשָׁכַנְתִּ֥י <S%H7931><s%> ve-sha-chan-Ti from me and I will dwell בְתוֹכָ֖ם <S%H8432><s%> ve-to-Cham in the midst לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam. of them for ever ס sa-Mek

אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- Thou son אָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, of man הַגֵּ֤ד <S%H5046><s%> hag-Ged shew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֵּֽית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit, to the house וְיִכָּלְמ֖וּ <S%H3637><s%> ve-yik-kal-Mu that they may be ashamed מֵעֲוֹנֽוֹתֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5771><s%> me-'a-vo-no-tei-Hem; of their iniquities וּמָדְד֖וּ <S%H4058><s%> u-ma-de-Du and let them measure אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- תָּכְנִֽית׃ <S%H8508><s%> ta-che-Nit. the pattern

וְאִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> ve-'im- If נִכְלְמ֞וּ <S%H3637><s%> nich-le-Mu And if they be ashamed מִכֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol of all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- they עָשׂ֗וּ <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Su, of all that they have done צוּרַ֣ת <S%H6699><s%> tzu-Rat them the form הַבַּ֡יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the house וּתְכוּנָת֡וֹ <S%H8498><s%> u-te-chu-na-To and the fashion וּמוֹצָאָ֡יו <S%H4161><s%> u-mo-tza-'Av thereof and the goings out וּמוֹבָאָ֣יו <S%H4126><s%> u-moa-'Av thereof and the comings וְֽכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol all צֽוּרֹתָ֡ו <S%H6699><s%> tzu-ro-Tav in thereof and all the forms וְאֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all חֻקֹּתָיו֩ <S%H2708><s%> chuk-ko-Tav thereof and all the ordinances וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all; צוּרֹתָי tzu-ro-tai כצ֨וּרֹתָ֤יו <S%H6699><s%> tzu-ro-Tav design קוְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol whole; תֹּורֹתֹו to-ro-tov כתֹּורֹתָיו֙ <S%H8451><s%> to-ro-Tav bullock קהוֹדַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> ho-Da' shew אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> o-Tam, וּכְתֹ֖ב <S%H3789><s%> u-che-To thereof and write לְעֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> le-'ei-nei-Hem; [it] in their sight וְיִשְׁמְר֞וּ <S%H8104><s%> ve-yish-me-Ru that they may keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all צוּרָת֛וֹ <S%H6699><s%> tzu-ra-To thereof and all the forms וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all חֻקֹּתָ֖יו <S%H2708><s%> chuk-ko-Tav thereof and all the ordinances וְעָשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> ve-'a-Su thereof and do אוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> o-Tam.

זֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise תּוֹרַ֣ת <S%H8451><s%> to-Rat This [is] the law הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit; of the house עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh Upon the top הָ֠הָר <S%H2022><s%> Ha-hor of the mountain כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- entire גְּבֻל֞וֹ <S%H1366><s%> ge-vu-Lo the whole limit סָבִ֤יב׀ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv thereof round about סָבִיב֙ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv around קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> Ko-desh [shall be] most קָדָשִׁ֔ים <S%H6944><s%> ka-da-Shim, holy הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> hin-neh- Behold זֹ֖את <S%H2063><s%> zot likewise תּוֹרַ֥ת <S%H8451><s%> to-Rat Behold this [is] the law הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit. of the house

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh and these מִדּ֤וֹת <S%H4060><s%> mid-Dot And these [are] the measures הַמִּזְבֵּ֙חַ֙ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach of the altar בָּֽאַמּ֔וֹת <S%H520><s%> ba-'am-Mot, after the cubits אַמָּ֥ה <S%H520><s%> 'am-Mah The cubit אַמָּ֖ה <S%H520><s%> 'am-Mah [is] a cubit וָטֹ֑פַח <S%H2948><s%> va-To-fach; and an hand breadth וְחֵ֨יק <S%H2436><s%> ve-Cheik even the bottom הָאַמָּ֜ה <S%H520><s%> ha-'am-Mah [shall be] a cubit וְאַמָּה־ <S%H520><s%> ve-'am-mah- a cubit רֹ֗חַב <S%H7341><s%> Ro-chav, and the breadth וּגְבוּלָ֨הּ <S%H1366><s%> u-ge-vu-Lah and the border אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- on שְׂפָתָ֤הּ <S%H8193><s%> se-fa-Tah thereof by the edge סָבִיב֙ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv thereof round about זֶ֣רֶת <S%H2239><s%> Ze-ret span הָאֶחָ֔ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad, [shall be] a וְזֶ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> ve-Zeh and this גַּ֥ב <S%H1354><s%> gav and this [shall be] the higher place הַמִּזְבֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H4196><s%> ham-miz-Be-ach. of the altar
